name: David Ramirez
text: Eh, I think ignorance as a term is ok because the questions are mentioning a difference in relative awareness of issues across different groups. Their absolute knowledge of the statistics isn't what matters but how it compares to that of other nations.    I'm sure the poverty has an effect, but we know a lot of people who are educated and have money but are willfully ignorant, who basically deceived themselves into becoming fact averse to extremes.
